survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Car Wash Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers using subscription-based car wash services to understand satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and explore future service preferences.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based car wash service?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for ease of interpretation. Ensure the scale is balanced and mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based car wash service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a car wash subscription service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question to identify key priorities. Ensure the options cover common service aspects.

script.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a car wash subscription service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use your subscription car wash service per month?
questions.client_notes: Quantify usage patterns to assess service utilization.

script.question_text: How often do you use your subscription car wash service per month?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current car wash subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit text input to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current car wash subscription service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current car wash subscription service to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current car wash subscription service to others?
